tooltip.beaconite813.unstable_beacon_blo: §9§oRequires a level 5 beacon base and visibility to the sky.
§9§oThen, supply a nether star, and run away if you want to live.
§9§oMake sure to check the crater afterwards for a special surprise...
§9§oYou'll get better loot by making a bigger beacon, but this will make the explosion much larger.
§9§oAlso instakills all withers in range. Nether star farm, anyone?
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor1.toolti: §9§oFor every beacon block below the constructor, it will build a base of the corresponding area.
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor2.toolti: §9§oYou can get a max of 20 levels by default, changeable in the config.
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor3.toolti: §9§oThe quarry talisman, if placed in the input, will make the constructor break blocks...
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor4.toolti: §9§oBut you still need the beacon base blocks beneath!
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon1.tool: §9§oConsumes foods in the yellow slot and applies the food effects to nearby players.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon2.tool: §9§oAdd extra food in the red slot to increase duration.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon3.tool: §9§oMore effects mean that filling the beacon will be harder.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon4.tool: §9§oMinimum beacon level is 6, maximum level is 15(Level X effects)
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon5.tool: §9§oWhen satiation runs out, all effects will be reset... Feed it regularly!
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon6.tool: §9§oAlso: Don't feed this a pufferfish. It will work and you will probably die.
§9§oThis block is used to form all other special beacons.
§9§oPlace this beacon in the center of a 3x3 cube of a fitting material.
§9§oBlocks made using encapsulated light can all be used, and will create different special beacons.
